data.title: Siebel System: Anatomy of Sales. Understanding The Business: Dilemma
data.meta_description: Siebel System - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The document discusses Siebel Systems, a leading CRM software company founded in 1993. It details Siebel's rapid growth and market leadership. It also describes a sales scenario where a Siebel salesperson, Gregg Carman, must determine how to proceed with a potential client, Quick & Reilly, after they are acquired by Siebel's largest client. Carman takes a thoughtful approach, focusing on understanding the client's needs without prematurely comparing Siebel to competitors. The document outlines Siebel's customer-centric founding philosophy and sales methodology, emphasizing customer satisfaction, action, and understanding prospects' organizations to close deals.
